sentence.Network_en: Awake, psaltery and harp : I myself will awake early.
sentence.Network_cn: 2琴瑟阿,你们当醒起.我自己要极早醒起.

sentence.Network_en: Awake up , my glory; awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.
sentence.Network_cn: 8我的灵阿,(原文作荣耀)你当醒起, 琴瑟阿, 你们当醒起.我自己要极早醒起.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English sautrie, from Old French sauterie, from Latin psalterium (see psalter)

means.word_mean: 1. an ancient stringed instrument similar to the lyre or zither but having a trapezoidal sounding board under the strings
